public class DependencyProvider
extends java.lang.Object

    Removes and closes the dependency with the given name.

    Returns whether or not there is a dependency registered with the given name.

  • Method Details

    • lookup

      public java.util.Optional<Dependency> lookup​(java.lang.String name)
      Attempts to fetch a dependency by name.
      Returns:
      An option that will be empty if no dependency was found with the given name.

    • has

      public boolean has​(java.lang.String name)
      Returns whether or not there is a dependency registered with the given name.

    • register

      public void register​(Dependency dep)
      Register a new dependency.

    • closeAndRemove

      public void closeAndRemove​(java.lang.String name) throws java.lang.Exception
      Removes and closes the dependency with the given name. If no dependency was found with the given name, this method does nothing.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • testDependencies

      public java.util.List<Dependency.TestResult> testDependencies()
      Runs the test method on all currently registered dependencies and returns a map of the test results keyed on dependency name.

    • shutDown

      public void shutDown()
      Attempts to shut down all dependencies currently registered.

    • getInstance

      public static DependencyProvider getInstance()
